issue.title: Tutorial links not working
issue.body: I tried to use the links for the tutorial inside the ross web page (https://ross-rotordynamics.github.io/ross-website/examples/tutorial.html) and, although they work when we are using the jupyter notebook, it looks like they do not work there on the website.

issue.title: Magnitude plot unit
issue.body:
Dear all, good afternoon,

I would like to ask about the output unit displayed in the magnitude plot while using the "rotor.run_freq_response" module.
The displacement output is really supposed to be returned in "m/N"?
If the answer is yes, would you kindly explain to me the physical meaning of this unit and its origin, please?

Best regards, 


![Magnitude](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/115513023/194978770-dffca058-724f-4179-9df0-69733ddcb019.PNG)
